tag_list: blogging, social, social-media, digital, digital-media, seo
overview:
I’m currently CEO of Rockefeller Innovation LLC, a social media agency focused on the new media, on the land of Dubai, UAE. Besides that, I am running 9to5LOL and was the founder of Gagism which I sold later on. Having the passion for Ideas, I also organize TEDx events and thus have the license of TEDxRawalLake under my belt.

I’m a Pakistani, raised in Saudi Arabia and lived my teenage in Islamabad. I’m a huge fan of ideas, startups, photography and designing. They say I speak too fast, while I guess I work too fast too.

Follow me on Twitter (@SalluHee), subscribe to me on Facebook (/salmansaeed90) or, read my blog.
